params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_item
params.description: Max number of findings that will be returned for each item scanned. When set within InspectDataSourceRequest, the maximum returned is 1000 regardless if this is set higher. When set within InspectContentRequest, this field is ignored.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_request
params.description: Max number of findings that will be returned per request/job. When set within InspectContentRequest, the maximum returned is 1000 regardless if this is set higher.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_info_type
params.description: Configuration of findings limit given for specified infoTypes.

methods.name: getMaxFindingsPerItem
methods.description:
Max number of findings that will be returned for each item scanned.

When set within InspectDataSourceRequest, the maximum returned is 1000 regardless if this is set higher. When set within InspectContentRequest, this field is ignored.
